content: this means you may not copy and sell or digitally distribute the pattern you may however sell items you make with the pattern fasten_off with long tail when you fasten_off leave extra yarn 6-12 inches this end can be used to attach pieces by threading the end of the yarn through a tapestry needle and stitching the pieces in place pattern body make 1 in mc chain 2 round 1 single_crochet 6 times in 2nd chain from hook 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 increase single_crochet in next st x 6 18 round 4 increase single_crochet in next 2 st x 6 24 round 5 increase single_crochet in next 3 st x 6 30 round 6 increase single_crochet in next 4 st x 6 36 round 7-12 single_crochet in each st 36 6 rounds round 13 decrease single_crochet in next 4 st x 6 30 round 14 decrease single_crochet in next 3 st x 6 24 round 15 decrease single_crochet in next 2 st x 6 18 stuff body ©2020 texasstitchchicks this pattern is not available for commercial release this means you may not copy and sell or digitally distribute the pattern you may however sell items you make with the pattern round 16 decrease single_crochet in next st x 6 12 add a bit more stuffing round 17 decrease x 6 6 round 18 slip_stitch first and fourth st together fasten_off with really long tail about 24 stem make 1 in cc the stem is crocheted in row starting with long tail about 12 chain 5 row 1 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch in next 3 chain 4 fasten_off with long tail assembly place long tail of body on tapestry needle insert tapestry needle into the top of body and out the bottom pulling tightly to create sections ©2020 texasstitchchicks this pattern is not available for commercial release this means you may not copy and sell or digitally distribute the pattern you may however sell items you make with the pattern repeat 5 times to create five sections of body tie knot on bottom of body pull tail through to inside of body and cut yarn using long tails attach stem to top of pumpkin tie yarn tails together pull tails through to inside of body and cut yarn you have now completed the pumpkin great job feel free to show it on facebook and instagram and tag @texasstitchchicks so we can see your creation ©2020 texasstitchchicks this pattern is not available for commercial release this means you may not copy and sell or digitally distribute the pattern you may however sell items you make with the pattern
